problem_names: lemma trans_strict_pareto: "X \<succ>Pareto Y \<Longrightarrow> Y \<succ>Pareto Z \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z"

lemma feasible_private_ownershipD:
  assumes "feasible_private_ownership A F \<E> Cs Ps X Y"
  shows "(\<Sum>i\<in>A. X i) \<le> (\<Sum>i\<in>A. \<E> i) + (\<Sum>j\<in>F. Y j)"
    and "(\<forall>i\<in>A. X i \<in> Cs)" and "(\<forall>j\<in>F. Y j \<in> Ps j)"
translations: lemma trans_strict_pareto: "X \<succ>Pareto Y \<Longrightarrow> Y \<succ>Pareto Z \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
assume a1: "X \<succ>Pareto Y"

proof (state)
this:
  X \<succ>Pareto Y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
assume "Y \<succ>Pareto Z"

proof (state)
this:
  Y \<succ>Pareto Z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  Y \<succ>Pareto Z
have f3: "\<forall>i \<in> agents. U[i] (Z i) \<le> U[i] (X i)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Y \<succ>Pareto Z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (Z i) \<le> U[i] (X i)
by (meson a1 order_trans pareto_dominating_def)

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (Z i) \<le> U[i] (X i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  \<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (Z i) \<le> U[i] (X i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
have "\<exists>i \<in> agents. \<not> U[i] (X i) \<le> U[i] (Y i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>i\<in>agents. \<not> U[i] (X i) \<le> U[i] (Y i)
using a1 pareto_dominating_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  X \<succ>Pareto Y
  ?X \<succ>Pareto ?Y =
  ((\<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (?Y i) \<le> U[i] (?X i)) \<and>
   (\<exists>i\<in>agents. U[i] (?Y i) < U[i] (?X i)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>i\<in>agents. \<not> U[i] (X i) \<le> U[i] (Y i)
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>i\<in>agents. \<not> U[i] (X i) \<le> U[i] (Y i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>X \<succ>Pareto Y; Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> X \<succ>Pareto Z
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (Z i) \<le> U[i] (X i)
  \<exists>i\<in>agents. \<not> U[i] (X i) \<le> U[i] (Y i)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (Z i) \<le> U[i] (X i)
  \<exists>i\<in>agents. \<not> U[i] (X i) \<le> U[i] (Y i)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<succ>Pareto Z
by (metis \<open>Y \<succ>Pareto Z\<close> less_eq_real_def pareto_dominating_def)

proof (state)
this:
  X \<succ>Pareto Z

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma anti_sym_strict_pareto: "X \<succ>Pareto Y \<Longrightarrow> \<not>Y \<succ>Pareto X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<succ>Pareto Y \<Longrightarrow> \<not> Y \<succ>Pareto X
using pareto_dominating_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?X \<succ>Pareto ?Y =
  ((\<forall>i\<in>agents. U[i] (?Y i) \<le> U[i] (?X i)) \<and>
   (\<exists>i\<in>agents. U[i] (?Y i) < U[i] (?X i)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. X \<succ>Pareto Y \<Longrightarrow> \<not> Y \<succ>Pareto X
by auto
end
subsection \<open> Budget constraint\<close>
text \<open> Definition returns all afforedable bundles given wealth W \<close>
text \<open> f is a function that computes the value given a bundle\<close>

definition budget_constraint
  where
    "budget_constraint f S W = {x \<in> S. f x \<le> W}"
subsection \<open> Feasiblity \<close>

definition feasible_private_ownership
  where
    "feasible_private_ownership A F \<E> Cs Ps X Y \<longleftrightarrow>
      (\<Sum>i\<in>A. X i) \<le> (\<Sum>i\<in>A. \<E> i) + (\<Sum>j\<in>F. Y j) \<and>
      (\<forall>i\<in>A. X i \<in> Cs) \<and> (\<forall>j\<in>F. Y j \<in> Ps j)"

lemma feasible_private_ownershipD:
  assumes "feasible_private_ownership A F \<E> Cs Ps X Y"
  shows "(\<Sum>i\<in>A. X i) \<le> (\<Sum>i\<in>A. \<E> i) + (\<Sum>j\<in>F. Y j)"
    and "(\<forall>i\<in>A. X i \<in> Cs)" and "(\<forall>j\<in>F. Y j \<in> Ps j)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum X A \<le> sum \<E> A + sum Y F &&&
    \<forall>i\<in>A. X i \<in> Cs &&& \<forall>j\<in>F. Y j \<in> Ps j
using assms feasible_private_ownership_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  feasible_private_ownership A F \<E> Cs Ps X Y
  feasible_private_ownership ?A ?F ?\<E> ?Cs ?Ps ?X ?Y =
  (sum ?X ?A \<le> sum ?\<E> ?A + sum ?Y ?F \<and>
   (\<forall>i\<in>?A. ?X i \<in> ?Cs) \<and>
   (\<forall>j\<in>?F. ?Y j \<in> ?Ps j))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum X A \<le> sum \<E> A + sum Y F &&&
    \<forall>i\<in>A. X i \<in> Cs &&& \<forall>j\<in>F. Y j \<in> Ps j
apply blast

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>i\<in>A. X i \<in> Cs
 2. \<forall>j\<in>F. Y j \<in> Ps j

by (meson assms feasible_private_ownership_def)
    (meson assms feasible_private_ownership_def)
end
